title: The Problem of refuse disposal
brief_description: Provides an insight into one of modern society’s urgent problems: how to dispose of the ever-increasing quantities of refuse that we produce everyday. Shows collection and various methods of disposal, including tipping, pulverising, composting with the addition of sewage sludge, or incineration, in a number of countries, such as Britain, France, German and Switzerland.
